Verses: 1 benyameen Dhesaththilulla Aanadhodh Oorilirundha Aasaariyargalil Oruvanaagiya Ilkkiyaavin Kumaaran Eremiyaavinudaiya Vasanangal:
2 aamonudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yosiyaa Engira Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaavin Naatkalil, Avan Arasaanda Padhinmoondraam Varushaththil Ivanukkuk Karththarudaiyavaarththai Undaayitru.

3 appuram Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeem Engira Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaavin Naatkalilum, Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Engira Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaavin Padhinoraam Varushaththu Mudivumattaagavum, Erusalem Ooraar Aindhaam Maadhaththil Siraippattuppogumvaraikkum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Undaayitru.

5 naan Unnaith Thaayin Vayitril Uruvaakku Munne Unnai Arindhen; Nee Karppaththilirundhu Velippadumunne Naan Unnaip Parisuththampanni, Unnai Jaadhigalukkuth Theerkkadharisiyaagak Kattalaiyitten Endru Sonnaar.
6 appozhudhu Naan: Aa Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Idho, Naan Pesa Ariyen; Sirupillaiyaayirukkiren Endren.
7 aanaalum Karththar, Naan Sirupillaiyendru Nee Sollaadhe, Naan Unnai Anuppugira Ellaaridaththilum Nee Poi Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiravaigalaiyellaam Nee Pesuvaayaaga.
8 nee Avargalukku Bayappadavendaam; Unnaik Kaakkumpadikku Naan Unnudane Irukkiren Endru Karththar Solli,
9 karththar Thamadhu Karaththai Neetti, En Vaayaith Thottu: Idho, En Vaarththaigalai Un Vaayile Vaikkiren.
10 paar, Pidungavum, Idikkavum, Azhikkavum, Kavizhkkavum, Kattavum, Naattavum Unnai Naan Indraiyadhinam Jaadhigalinmelum Raajyangalinmelum Erpaduththinen Endru Karththar Ennudane Sonnaar.
11 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar: Eremiyaave, Nee Ennaththaik Kaangiraai Endru Kettaar, Vaadhumaimaraththin Kilaiyaik Kaangiren Endren.
12 appozhudhu Karththar: Nee Kandadhu Sariye; En Vaarththaiyaith Theeviramaai Niraivetruven Endraar.
13 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Irandaandharam Enakku Undaagi, Avar Nee Kaangiradhu Enna Endru Kettaar; Pongugira Paanaiyaik Kaangiren, Adhin Vaai Vadakkeyirundhu Nokkugiradhu Endren.
14 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Vadakkeyirundhu Theengu Dhesaththinudaiya Kudigal Ellaarmelum Varum.

15 idho, Naan Vadathisai Raajyangalin Vamsangalaiyellaam Kooppiduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avargal Vandhu Avanavan Than Than Singaasanaththai Erusalemin Olimugavaasalgalukkum, Adhin Sutrumadhilgal Ellaavatrirkum Virodhamaagavum, Yoodhaa Dhesaththu Ellaap Pattanangalukkum Virodhamaagavum Vaippaargal.

16 avargal Ennaivittu Anniya Dhevargalukkuth Thoobankaatti, Thangal Kaigalin Kiriyaiyaip Panindhukonda Avargaludaiya Sagala Theemaigalinimiththamum Naan En Nyaayaththeerppugalai Avargalukku Virodhamaagak Kooruven.

17 aagaiyaal Nee Un Araiyaik Kattikkondu Nindru, Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiravaigalaiyellaam Avargalukku Sol; Naan Unnai Avargalukku Munbaagak Kalangappannaadhapadikku, Nee Avargal Mugaththukku Anjaadhiru.

18 idho, Dhesamanaiththukkum, Yoodhaavin Raajaakkalukkum, Adhin Prabukkalukkum, Adhin Aasaariyargalukkum, Dhesaththin Janangalukkum Edhiraaga Naan Unnai Indraiya Dhinam Aranippaana Pattanamum, Iruppuththoonum, Vengala Alangamum Aakkinen.
19 avargal Unakku Virodhamaaga Yuththampannuvaargal; Aanaalum Unnai Merkollamaattaargal; Unnai Ratchikkumpadikku Naan Unnudane Irukkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
